title: Noise Detection Prototype in Library
description: Prorotype of noise level detector in the library using buzzer as a warning sign to maintain order. The library is a special place that is used as a place to focus on finding new knowledge, looking for book references or even the most comfortable place when studying, so a tool is needed to maintain order and comfort for students in the library
